title: Demand inelastic, consumers bear the tax

content.question: If the market demand for a good is inelastic and the supply is elastic, which of the following is true when there is an increase in sales tax?

choices.label: Consumers will bear most of the burden of the tax.
Producers will bear all of the burden of the tax.
Producers will bear most of the burden of the tax or risk losing sales.
Both consumers and producers will share the burden of the tax equally.
The price of the good will not change.

content.answer: Consumers will bear most of the burden of the tax.
